trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway's gaze is fixed on the moon's economic prosperity.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the stockpiling Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the stockpiling Loporrit in the Carrotorium.

TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Thanks to the Loporrit carats developed by Coiningway, the moon's economic influence is expanding in leaps and bounds.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>If we are to maintain this stellar growth, we need to produce more coins. As a counterfeiting countermeasure, however, the process is extremely involved.

TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>That being the case, we'd be grateful if you could lend your skills to the manufacturing effort. My stockpiling colleague in the Carrotorium will provide you with the materials you need.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_010<tab>You're helping us manufacture Loporrit carats? Wonderful, wonderful!
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_011<tab>Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make a precision mold.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_012<tab>Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make polishing cloth.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_013<tab>Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make polishing agent.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_014<tab>Once you've finished, please deliver the items to Managingway. And if you run out of materials, I'll furnish you with more from my stockpile.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_020<tab>You want more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_021<tab>You need more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_022<tab>You need more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_023<tab>You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_024<tab>You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_LOPORRIT04689_000_025<tab>You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>There you are. Do you perchance have some coin manufacturing components for me...?
TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Excellent, I will pass these on to Coiningway at once. Here is a Loporrit carat by way of thanks for your troubles.

TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>...Hm? Judging by your expression, it seems you're not pleased by the choice of reward. But believe me when I say there's a perfectly sound economic reason for it.

TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_033<tab>You see, a currency is only worth something if people have confidence in it, and confidence comes from widespread circulation. That's to say, your possessing the carats imbues them with value─value that you benefit from!

TEXT_BANLOP103_04689_MANAGINGWAY_000_034<tab>But on the other side of the proverbial coin, excess circulation diminishes a currency's value. It's a fine balancing act, but rest assured I shall manage it with all meticulousness!
